descriptionHtml:
[Game]
Skyrim

[Mod Name]
Bloodskal Sword Revamp

[Author(s)]
Didymus Ei

[Contact Info]
Message me on the Nexus

[Version]
1.3

[size=4][b]Authors activity on this mod: [color=red] Inactive[/color]
I am on a break as of March 15th, 2015. I\'ll check for bug reports over the first few weeks after the 15th.[/b][/size]

[Description]
Use a special altar to power up the Bloodskal Sword using Dragon Souls. 
Use a total of 10 Dragon Souls to power the swords special power to 250 
from the vanilla damage of 30, in increaments of 25. Each power up has a 
level requirement. Make the Bloodskal Sword stronger, but work for it!

Kills done by the energy released from the blade result in disintegration. 

[Instructions]

1. Acquire the Bloodskal Sword.
2. Locate the altar within Raven Rock Mine (At the end near the Dragon Wall)
3. Activate Sword Altar.
4. Activate newly spawned \"console\".
5. ???
6. Profit.

- Level requirements for each power up are: 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48, 54, 60
- Each power up increases the power attack ability by 25 damage.

[Change Log]
v1.3
- Dragons should no longer disintegrate.
- Disintegrate can be toggled off through the MCM (needs SKSE)

v1.2
- Fixed issue with damage on one of the attacks
- Changed the death visual of NPCs

V1.1 
- Improved Dust Death Visual
- Increased Level requirement
- Changed how damage is dealt

V1.0 
- Initial release

[Required Files]
Official Dragonborn DLC

[Installation]
Unzip the file. Drag and drop the Data folder into your skyrim game directory. (steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/).

[Clean Install]
When there\'s an update to the level requirement I recommend doing a clean install. To do so:
- Disable mod
- Start game, load, save.
- Update mod
- Re-load save.
- To get previously used souls back type in console \"player.modav dragonsouls #\" without the quotes.


[Known Issues]

- Balance may still be an issue. Give me feedback.
- Sometimes the energy doesn\'t fire. I don\'t think it\'s this mod, but it tends to happen a lot in my game.

[Compatabilities]
- This mod should be compatible with any mod as long as it doesn\'t edit the Bloodskal Sword. 

[FAQ]

Q. I\'ve already cleared the mine and there\'s a gate blocking my path. What do?

A. If you go the back way through Bloodskal Burrow and get to where the Black Book was you can reach through the gate and toggle the lever which opens the gate.

Skyrim Readme Generator V6 by - DarkSaber9000

Do not, however, upload this file to any other website without my permission.
